duties_responsibilities.duty: Diligently review medication therapies to ensure they align with the patient's diagnosis and treatment plan.
Accurately and safely compound medications in appropriate dosage forms, ensuring patients receive the right treatment.
Package and dispense pre-manufactured dosage forms with precision and care.
Identify and consult on possible drug interactions to prevent adverse outcomes.

Provide comprehensive education or in-services on rational medication therapy and medication procedures to healthcare professionals, students, patients, or the public as needed, ensuring informed decision-making.
Assist in the supervision and training of pharmacy technician personnel, fostering a collaborative and knowledgeable team.

Maintain expertise in facility utilization of automated dispensing processes, including the use of automated dispensing units, Connect RX, overwrap packaging, and barcoding, to optimize pharmacy operations.

education_certification.credential: A Bachelor of Science Degree in Pharmacy or a Pharm. D degree from an accredited College of Pharmacy.
